content.question: Which of the following correctly shows the derivation of <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of, cotangent x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of, cotangent x, equals, the derivative, with respect to x, of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator tangent x, close parenthesis, which equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator, the derivative, with respect to x, of, tangent x, close parenthesis, end fraction, which equals, the fraction with numerator negative 1, and denominator secant squared of x." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>sec</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 2.10: Finding the Derivatives of Tangent, Cotangent, Secant, and/or Cosecant Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
